metadata.title: CVE-2017-12938 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
UnRAR before 5.5.7 allows remote attackers to bypass a directory-traversal protection mechanism via vectors involving a symlink to the . directory, a symlink to the .. directory, and a regular file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-12938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunrar-headers - 1:5.5.8-1
libunrar5 - 1:5.5.8-1
unrar - 1:5.5.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrar-nonfree package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.5.8-1').
